mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_notbucket order by b_rec desc
SELECT * FROM tbl_notbucket where b_rec > 10 order by b_rec desc
select * from tbl_notbucket order by b_rec desc limit 1
select * from tbl_notbucket a left join tbl_mynotbucket b on a.b_seq = b.b_seq where username = #{username} order by a.b_seq desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_notbucket WHERE b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%' )
) AS SUB ORDER BY b_seq desc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_notbucket ( n_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, n_username VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, n_sdate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, n_stime VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, n_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, n_content VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, n_edate VARCHAR(10), n_etime VARCHAR(10) )
